|rad1chip2 = Maxim;MAX2820; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 22 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Global Sun GL2422RT-1T8 (silkscreened on the board), the firmware contains the string GL2422RT-1T7-B10 [http://mozy.org/DI-614/ internal shots at mozy.org]
[http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html on the HRI hardware table] :OS noted as '''ThreadX''' [http://fixunix.com/freebsd/310085-wpa-dlink-di-614-a.html OUI mention on a B2] :The B2 appears to be made in China. ==Links of Interest== [http://support.dlink.com/emulators/di614plus_revB/ Interface emulator] ==Pictures==
